events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the product I did not order.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning the case to agent Alice Johnson for handling the refund process related to the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I’m Alice, and I’ll be helping you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed, may I also ask you to send a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the item that does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and arrange a return label for you to send back the wrong item.
That sounds great, thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt support.
Your refund has been processed and you will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now as the refund was completed successfully and customer confirmed satisfaction.
